itunes:title: Acts Week 1 with Christine Caine
title: Acts Week 1 with Christine Caine
description:
For the first week of our Acts series, Raechel and Amanda talk with Christine Caine, an Australian born, Greek blooded, lover of Jesus, activist, author, and international speaker. Walking us through the account of the early Church, and the coming of the Holy Spirit, they discuss what it means to bear witness to what we have seen, heard, and believed. Listen along and prepare your heart to be encouraged!


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Acts reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Acts collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/acts-week-1-with-christine-caine
